doc.title: Five Reasons to Kill Casper Moronii
doc.plot: "Five Reasons to Kill Casper Moronii" follows five unlikely assassins into the home of one man, Casper Moronii, all sharing one goal: to kill Casper, and each having their own reason. The catch is, none of them know each other are out for the same purpose, and consequently, they all happen to show up on the same night. When they find Casper lying of the floor covered in blood, tension builds as the scene sparks a blame game of whodunit. Throw a large sum of money into the mix, and each person's greed turns everyone against each other in a fight to their deaths. When all is silent, Casper wakes up in a daze only to find his kitchen a mess and his sauce indistinguishable from blood.
